snippet: Bowing to the competition online, the encyclopedia's publisher said the 2010 edition, a 32-volume set that weighs in at 129 pounds, would be the last.
abstract: Bowing to the competition online, the encyclopedia's publisher said the 2010 edition, a 32-volume set that weighs in at 129 pounds, would be the last.

headline.main: After 244 Years, Encyclopaedia Britannica Stops the Presses
headline.print_headline: Britannica Is Reduced to a Click
